alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 28 at 11:56AM MST until January 29 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MST SUNDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine, Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton and Western and Central Chouteau County. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to Noon MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Western and Central Chouteau County
